-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Simple implementation of call-by-need using Launchbury's semantics
--   
--   A simple implementation of Launchbury's operational semantics for lazy
--   languages.
@package TinyLaunchbury
@version 1.0.1

module TinyLaunchbury
data Expr
Lambda :: Name -> Expr -> Expr
Apply :: Expr -> Name -> Expr
Var :: Name -> Expr
Let :: Bindings -> Expr -> Expr
Prim :: Name -> Expr -> Expr -> Expr
Ctor :: Int -> [Name] -> Expr
Case :: Expr -> Alts -> Expr

-- | Reduces an expression, and returns a string containing the log
--   appended with the result
reduce :: Expr -> String

-- | Prints the result of reduce to stdout. The main reason for this
--   function is that the log contains newline Chars, and newlines don't
--   format correctly in ghci.
displayReduce :: Expr -> IO ()
instance Eq Expr
instance Show Expr
